articles.title: PM In J&K Today, 1st Formal Event After Special Status Scrapped: 10 Facts
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will today hold his first public event in Jammu and Kashmir, over two years after the centre scrapped special status to the state and divided it into two Union Territories.
